description:
A new observer, Nio Andou, arrives at Tanegashima base.  And at the same time, the Kiltgangs Molekin and Zimbardo appear.  They steal control of a new type of interceptor used by the Ark Faction, and use it to attack the Midsummers Knights.  Akari uses her hacking to steal control of the Cerberus and manages to shut down the Kiltgang.
Source: crunchyroll
